<h3 id="X31804">X(31804) = CENTER OF THE ORTHOPOLAR CIRCLE OF THESE TRIANGLES: ABC-X3 REFLECTIONS AND ANTI-ASCELLA</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; (-a^2+b^2+c^2)*(4*a^8-7*(b^2+c^2)*a^6+3*(b^2-c^2)^2*a^4-(b^4-c^4)*(b^2-c^2)*a^2+(b^2-c^2)^4)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(31804) = X(4)-3*X(11402) = 3*X(3796)-2*X(16197) = 3*X(12161)-X(31815) = X(12167)-3*X(14912) = 3*X(31802)-2*X(31815)</b>
<p>X(31804) lies on these lines:
{3,69}, {4,11402}, {5,156}, {6,6756}, {20,12160}, {24,11245}, {26,13292}, {30,1181}, {49,11585}, {51,7715}, {52,1353}, {54,427}, {68,6676}, {98,19179}, {125,632}, {140,1899}, {154,21841}, {155,12362}, {185,550}, {217,18907}, {235,1614}, {287,8362}, {381,18945}, {389,2393}, {468,9707}, {511,31810}, {515,31811}, {516,31812}, {546,18396}, {548,10605}, {549,13367}, {567,7403}, {578,1503}, {631,26944}, {858,9545}, {1147,1368}, {1199,7576}, {1204,8703}, {1351,19119}, {1498,13488}, {1596,6759}, {1598,11206}, {1885,11456}, {1906,14157}, {1907,15033}, {1994,19362}, {2072,9704}, {2883,13403}, {2888,7495}, {3089,14530}, {3147,26869}, {3167,6643}, {3270,10386}, {3311,18924}, {3312,18923}, {3515,18916}, {3517,11433}, {3526,23291}, {3527,6995}, {3530,26937}, {3542,26864}, {3547,12429}, {3567,11387}, {3575,7592}, {3627,21659}, {3796,16197}, {3851,18918}, {3858,13851}, {5012,7399}, {5050,7401}, {5480,13419}, {5622,23236}, {6240,12254}, {6243,15073}, {6247,11430}, {6515,9715}, {7387,13142}, {7404,18440}, {7405,13353}, {7487,11432}, {7514,31831}, {7528,18583}, {7540,14627}, {7542,25738}, {7553,21850}, {7583,19355}, {7584,19356}, {9781,10301}, {9908,15818}, {10116,12359}, {10282,13567}, {10938,12111}, {10982,31383}, {11003,13160}, {11424,16655}, {11425,14216}, {11464,26879}, {11485,18930}, {11486,18929}, {11542,19363}, {11543,19364}, {11745,12007}, {12038,18128}, {12118,19458}, {12233,18400}, {12605,18445}, {13754,31807}, {14070,18951}, {14786,18358}, {15171,19354}, {16238,18952}, {16252,18390}, {16270,30714}, {16657,26883}, {18381,23292}, {18990,19349}, {19116,21641}, {19117,21640}, {23195,31381}</p>
<p>
X(31804) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {20, 12160}, {1181, 19467}, {6776, 19459}, {12118, 19458}<br>
X(31804) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (1595, 578), (31802, 12161)<br>
X(31804) = {X(i), X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (3, 6776, 18914), (6776, 18925, 3)<br>
</p>
